module.title: derived common nouns
module.p: Derived common nouns are common nouns which have been derived from other nouns, adjectives or verbs.

ul.li: the agentive suffix -seach eg. on foolish ⇒ oinseach foolish woman
the collective suffix -r(a)idh eg. mac son ⇒ macruidh band of young men, òg young ⇒ òigridh young people
the collective suffix -lach eg. taigh house ⇒ teaghlach family
